akn:content.akn:p: (a) Membership The Center shall have a Board of Directors, to be comprised of not more than twenty-seven members, as follows: When unable to attend a meeting of the Board, a member appointed under clauses (2), (3), (4), and (5) shall appoint an appropriate alternate from such member’s Department or agency to represent such member at that meeting.
(c) Vacancies Any member appointed to fill a vacancy occurring before the expiration of the term for which his predecessor was appointed shall be appointed for the remainder of that term.
